course_description: The course will train students selected by the Department of REALC to serve as Chinese peer mentors for CHN 101,102, 201, or 202. The course is "permission only". The department will interview the students and choose the qualified candidate. The mentors should be Chinese native speakers.
sections: Class Nbr: 1561, Section #: 1, Type: PRA, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: H. Cheng, Status: Open
